tag.blockbox.palisades.description: A fencelike block that can be carved with a Sword.
tag.blockbox.spiked_palisades.descriptio: A sharp block that damages and ensnares mobs that walk upon it.
block.blockbox.granite_bricks: A decorative block that has been carved into bricks.
block.blockbox.diorite_bricks: A decorative block that has been carved into bricks.
block.blockbox.andesite_bricks: A decorative block that has been carved into bricks.
block.blockbox.sandstone_bricks: A decorative block that has been carved into bricks.
block.blockbox.red_sandstone_bricks: A decorative block that has been carved into bricks.
block.blockbox.tiles: A tiled block made from Clay.
block.blockbox.broken_tile_mosaic: A decorative block that has been carved into a mosaic.
block.blockbox.carved_snow: A snow block with a friendly face.
block.blockbox.snow_bricks: A decorative block that has been carved into bricks.
block.blockbox.polished_packed_ice: A block of Packed Ice that has been polished.
block.blockbox.packed_ice_bricks: A decorative block that has been carved into bricks.
block.blockbox.polished_obsidian: A decorative block that is used to build Nether Portals.
block.blockbox.rough_glass: A block that may make for a nice window.
block.blockbox.rough_glass_pane: A block that may make for a nice windowpane.
block.blockbox.copper_bars: A decorative barrier block made of Copper. It must be waxed to prevent it from oxidizing.
block.blockbox.exposed_copper_bars: A decorative barrier that has been left alone until it has become exposed. It has been waxed to protect its patina.
block.blockbox.weathered_copper_bars: A decorative barrier that has has partially oxidized. It can be waxed to protect its patina.
block.blockbox.oxidized_copper_bars: A decorative barrier that was left to fully oxidize. It can be waxed to protect its patina.
block.blockbox.waxed_copper_bars: A decorative barrier block. It has been waxed to prevent any oxidization.
block.blockbox.waxed_exposed_copper_bars: A decorative barrier block that has begun to oxidize. It has been waxed to protect its patina.
block.blockbox.waxed_weathered_copper_ba: A decorative barrier block that has partially oxidized.  It has been waxed to protect its patina.
block.blockbox.waxed_oxidized_copper_bar: A decorative barrier that was left to fully oxidize. It has since been waxed to protect its patina.
block.blockbox.copper_pillar: A decorative block made of Copper. It must be waxed to prevent it from oxidizing.
block.blockbox.exposed_copper_pillar: A decorative block that has been left alone until it has become exposed. It has been waxed to protect its patina.
block.blockbox.weathered_copper_pillar: A decorative block that has has partially oxidized. It can be waxed to protect its patina.
block.blockbox.oxidized_copper_pillar: A decorative block that was left to fully oxidize. It can be waxed to protect its patina.
block.blockbox.waxed_copper_pillar: A decorative block. It has been waxed to prevent any oxidization.
block.blockbox.waxed_exposed_copper_pill: A decorative block that has begun to oxidize. It has been waxed to protect its patina.
block.blockbox.waxed_weathered_copper_pi: A decorative block that has partially oxidized.  It has been waxed to protect its patina.
block.blockbox.waxed_oxidized_copper_pil: A decorative block that was left to fully oxidize. It has since been waxed to protect its patina.
block.blockbox.iron_plate_pillar: A block of Iron that has been carved into a Pillar.
block.blockbox.chiseled_gold: A block of Gold that has been chiseled.
block.blockbox.golden_tiles: A block of Gold that has been carved into Tiles.
block.blockbox.golden_bricks: A block of Gold that has been carved into Bricks.
block.blockbox.golden_pillar: A block of Gold that has been carved into a Pillar.
block.blockbox.golden_bars: A block that can be used as a decorative barrier, suitable for windows and railings.
block.blockbox.polished_amethyst: A block of Amethyst that has been polished.
block.blockbox.cut_amethyst: A block of Amethyst that has been cut.
block.blockbox.amethyst_mosaic: A decorative block that has been carved into a mosaic.
block.blockbox.lapis_lazuli_bricks: A decorative block that has been carved into bricks.
block.blockbox.lapis_lazuli_mosaic: A decorative block that has been carved into a mosaic.
tag.blockbox.wooden_seats.description: A comfortable block that can be sat upon.
tag.blockbox.braziers.description: A light-emitting block that burns mobs that stand on it.
tag.blockbox.sky_lanterns.description: A light-emitting block that can be placed in midair.
